languages.text: If the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is calculated using Perception instead.
languages.original_text: Если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} навигатора выше, чем значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, то для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} навигатора используется Восприятие.

traits.locale_text: If the Navigator's Perception is higher than Agility, their dodge is calculated from Perception instead.
If the Navigator's Perception is higher than their Agility, their dodge is calculated using Perception instead.

If the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is calculated using Perception instead.

traits.locale_text: Если значение Восприятия навигатора выше, чем значение Ловкости, то для расчета уклонения навигатора используется Восприятие.

languages.text: 如果导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}高于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}，则导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}将会基于感知进行计算。

traits.locale_text: 如果导航者的感知高于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}，则导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}将会基于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}进行计算。

languages.text: Si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del navegante es mayor que su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} se calcula usando Percepción en su lugar.
languages.original_text: If the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is calculated using Perception instead.

traits.locale_text: Si la Percepción del navegante es mayor que su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} se calcula usando {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} en su lugar.

languages.text: Wenn die Wahrnehmung des Navigators höher ist als seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, wird {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} stattdessen mittels {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} berechnet.
languages.original_text: If the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is calculated using Perception instead.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die Wahrnehmung des Navigators höher ist als seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, wird {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g} stattdessen mittels {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} berechnet.

languages.text: Si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} du navigateur est supérieure à son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} est calculée à l'aide de la Perception.
languages.original_text: If the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is calculated using Perception instead.

traits.locale_text: Si la Perception du navigateur est supérieure à son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} est calculée à l'aide de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

languages.text: 航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}よりも高い場合、その{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}は代わりにPERを用いて計算される。

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}よりも高い場合、その{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}は代わりにPERを用いて計算される。
